patch 8.2.2559: MS-Windows: guifont test fails on Windows XP

Problem:    MS-Windows: guifont test fails on Windows XP.
Solution:   Check windowsversion().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/057e84afe5bd37fe272bf7cfafca629ef9da1bd3|patch 8.2.2558: no error if a lambda argument shadows a variable>
patch 8.2.2558: no error if a lambda argument shadows a variable

Problem:    No error if a lambda argument shadows a variable.
Solution:   Check that the argument name shadows a local, argument or script
            variable. (closes #7898)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2558: no error if a lambda argument shadows a variable 路 vim/vim@057e84a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2558: no error if a lambda argument shadows a variable 路 vim/vim@057e84a
attachments.text: Problem: No error if a lambda argument shadows a variable. Solution: Check that the argument name shadows a local, argument or script variable. (closes #7898)
